THE GAME

--- THE GAME ---
All the cards pairs are face down and you must discover two cards each tourn and find a pair. If two cards are equal, the player get rewarded, the two cards remain uncovered and the player must continue with the challenge of searching for the rest of the pairs until all the cards are discovered. If you don't find the card's pair, both cards are returned face down again and the fun challenge continues.


--- MODES ---
Memory Match will challenge your memory in an original way in it's "quest" or adventure mode. It has different and never seen levels that will guaranty you hours of entertaining and matchup fun. If you are in a hurry you can always play in a casual but as well entertaining gameplay mode with different card decks and number of cards to be found.

This fun game has many images in different decks categories that we have incorporated; some of these have more difficult images to remember and boost your brain. There is even a deck for kids, so this fun game can be play by all the family members.

This matching card game has:

- Cool and playful graphics
- Amazing sound FX
- Matching pairs of cards
- A Quick game mode
- A story mode
- Different levels of difficulty
- The grid adjusts automatically to your device
- Colorful images of logos, animals, cartoons, vehicles and more.

We hope you enjoy and have a great time playin Memory Match Fun!
